attributes.action: Ban the random drug/dring testing of police constables without just cause
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Home office circular 25 of 2000 allows the drug testing and drink testing of police officers on duty without reasonable cause. With possible criminal proceedings been undertaken should a test prove positive.

This cannot be dome to a member of the public so why should the Police be subject to this in breach of article 8 of the Human Rights Act
